Cabin Stores

Comprehensive maritime supply solutions for all your vessel needs. Quality products, reliable service, and global delivery.

Complete Maritime Supply Solutions

Our Cabin Stores service provides a comprehensive range of high-quality supplies essential for maritime operations. From professional-grade clothing to advanced medical equipment, we ensure your vessel is fully equipped with everything needed for safe and efficient operations.

Need Specialized Maritime Supplies?

Our expert team is ready to assist you with custom orders and specific requirements for your vessel.

Contact Us

Alcanza Ship Services has 30 years of experience in ship supply and spare parts. We provide new-built stores to shipyards and technical stores to ports and the offshore oil & gas sector. Recently, we expanded to supply cruise liners, prioritizing the health and safety of seafarers on all vessels we serve.
